question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/poseidon_bn254/constants.rs] [Static: Lazy<T>] [Race Condition] When multiple threads first access a POSEIDON_* static simultaneously, could race conditions in Lazy::new() initialization cause partial or inconsistent initialization? (High)
